subject: GENE
title: Special Directed Non-Technical Studies
description: This course is provided for students who, through academic studies during international exchange programs or other university related scholarly activities, wish to request a course credit for this work. Students wishing to claim this credit must show evidence of university level academic activity not otherwise claimed for credit. [Note: Permission of the Associate Chair of the Department in which the student is registered is required. Offered: F,W,S]
